title: Six senators accuse deputy attorney general of “glaring” crypto conflict
full_text: Six senators accuse deputy attorney general of “glaring” crypto conflict. An investigation found Todd Blanche owned at least $159,000 in related assets when he shut down crypto probes.. Six senators accused Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche this week of having a conflict of interest when he shut down investigations into crypto companies, dealers and exchanges and eliminated an en… [+5944 chars]
